name: Michael Hernandez
text: Me and my wife have try various amounts of different places to eat and have pizza at. However this one really sticks out compared to every other pizza place we have ever been to. The food is always extremely fresh and the dough is not soggy â€¦More

name: Michael Raphaelovich
text: First time customer. Ordered online and I got nothing but good things to say about this pizza shop.  Fantastic pizza, really tasty and will take your hunger away. My family and I would definitely order from Marcoâ€™s again.  Thank you Marco Pizza.

name: Ellie Guhl
text: We have consistently had great pizza at this location! Service is good, pizza is great. The online order option is good, a little vague at first but I caught on. We live nearby so order a couple times a month. Love it.

name: Miranda Nevins
text: Great pizza! Perfect crust and sauce, nice chunky toppings and very friendly staff. I have always been greeted with a smile and have always had hot fresh pizza.

name: Alter avi
text:
They totally lost my business I'm so angry I sent my daughter two by four pizzas and I got charged 65 dollars and I live nearby and I get the same thing every week around $35 absolutely never going back again ever.... ðŸ˜ 
Absolutely not paying $65 for a regular cheese pizza

name: Wyvrenne MacDaniels
text: Hot, gooey, fresh, crispy outside with a perfect pillow inside. Buzzfeed is missing out! The REAL worth it winner! I can go on! Just try it! Trust me.

name: Brian Wise
text: 3.99 med. Cheese pizza is back. I try to pick up a couple of these any time i'm in town for dinner. It taste great, and everyone in the house is happy with dinner.

name: Paula Brown
text: I absolutely love Marco's Pizza the best thing on the menu for me is there a talian sub it is the bomb don't get me wrong the pizza is good too highly recommended

name: Amber Owens
text: Would give a 0 if I could. Ordering was simple. My food sat in the window for 15 minutes while I sat there waiting to be told my food was ready. Asked for money back, then had to wait 10 minutes for someone. Then cashier snatched receipt out of my hand. I will not be returning!!

name: samuel main
text: I would not ever recommend this place to anyone. For the second time our order was messed up which I can understand happens but this time it was our pizza showing up pushed over to one side of the box and folded. Called to complain and â€¦More

name: Jason Buchanan
text: Really good pizza for the price. Was a nice treat.

name: Ancira Hemmen
text: This place is amazing! The staff and product are top notch!! And if u complete a survey u get a free cheesybread..thats about the size of a small pizza!!!

name: Rachelle Houck
text: Love the taste not the price.

name: Brad Weber
text: Great pizza and cool deal with the video place next door

name: Mond Wolf
text: Fast service good food. I'm about 10 mins away from this restaurant.  Every time I've placed a delivery order they've arrived at my house in less the 30 mins, with the food HOT and fresh, this well exceeds the ability of the local Red â€¦More

name: Logan Parrish
text: Tasty pizza, but the TV did not allow for conversation (even after we asked that the volume be turned down).

name: Anonymous
text: Great pizza , fast / friendly service .

name: Michael Tomich
text: Compared to the Marco's in Fort Worth, Texas, this place was disappointing...after ordering a 12" Italian sub with some minor additions and adjustments, which the worker read off to me correctly after typing it all in, my sub was still made â€¦More

name: Idris D Lord
text: Super good pizza; real topping

name: David B.
text: Usually take carry out.  Pizza is decent and fast unlike some other chains.  Never had any issues unlike others who have posted here.

name: Chandler Summers
text: It took them 2 hours to deliver 10 wings and breadsticks (my food was cold).  They then still charged me full price for the food. Terrible service this is my last time ordering from them. They have been at least 30 mins late every single â€¦More

name: gin Morris
text: This place sucks I have been on hold for 45 minutes waiting to order a pizza and still on hold. Pizza hut would never do this. Pretty damn sad.

name: Maria Hernandez
text: Foods pretty good...never had an issue!  Staff has always been friendly!

name: Soulsusta H
text: Deeelish! It is also neat and clean .

name: Katy McGuire
text: Too high priced for the quality...if your not from there, the coupons won't do you any good

name: Jason Garraway
text: Nothing beats hunger away like their Pepperoni Magnifico with extra cheese!

name: Jessica Scholes
text: Great food and personal service!!

name: Paula Smith
text: They have the spiciest wings you have tasted.

name: Dearmond Parker
text: Good food

name: Steve Tschetter
text: Perfectly fine.

name: dearlin brown
text: Awesome service and friendly

name: JC Kirk
text: Not very good pizza at all.

name: Niche Knight
text: Love love love this place!!!

name: Charlie F
text: Blah.  Disappointing.  I'd pass.
